Title: The Haunting
Writer: Nelson Gidding (screenplay), Shirley Jackson (based on the novel: "The Haunting of Hill House")
Actors: Julie Harris, Claire Bloom, Richard Johnson, Russ Tamblyn
Plot: Hill House has stood for about 90 years and appears haunted: its inhabitants have always met strange, tragic ends. Now Dr. John Markway has assembled a team of people who he thinks will prove whether or not the house is haunted.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 nomination.
